00016 // .NAME vtkSelectCellsFilter- actually remove a cell from a vtkPolyData object
00017 // .SECTION Description
00018 // vtkSelectCellsFilter allows you to mark cells (be they polygons, lines etc.) that will be exclusively 
00019 // passed to the output of the filter by removing the unmarked cells.
00020 
00021 // .SECTION Thanks
00022 // Goodwin Lawlor, University College Dublin
00023 
00024 
00025 #ifndef __vtkSelectCellsFilter_h
00026 #define __vtkSelectCellsFilter_h
00027 
00028 #include "vtkCellsFilter.h"
00029 #include "vtkBioengConfigure.h" // Include configuration header.
00030 
00031 class vtkLookupTable;
00032 
00033 class VTK_BIOENG_EXPORT vtkSelectCellsFilter : public vtkCellsFilter
00034 {
00035 public:
00036   // Description:
00037   // Constructs with initial values of zero.
00038   static vtkSelectCellsFilter *New();
00039 
00040   vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkSelectCellsFilter, vtkCellsFilter);
00041   void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00042 
00043   // Description:
00044   // Remove everything but the cells marked by MarkCell(cellid) or ToggleCells(cellid)
00045   void RemoveUnmarkedCells();
00046  
00047  // Description:
00048  // Undo all the remove operations 
00049  void UndoRemoveCells(){this->Initialize(); this->Modified();}
00050  
00051  // Desciption:
00052  // Get the number of cells that have been removed. GetNumberOfDeletedCells should be depreciated.
00053  int GetNumberOfDeletedCells(){return this->GetPolyDataInput(0)->GetNumberOfCells() - vtkPolyData::SafeDownCast(this->GetOutput())->GetNumberOfCells();}
00054  int GetNumberOfRemovedCells(){return this->GetPolyDataInput(0)->GetNumberOfCells() - vtkPolyData::SafeDownCast(this->GetOutput())->GetNumberOfCells();} 
00055 
00056 
00057 
00058 protected:
00059   vtkSelectCellsFilter(){};
00060   ~vtkSelectCellsFilter(){};
00061   
00062 
00063 private:
00064   vtkSelectCellsFilter(const vtkSelectCellsFilter&);  // Not implemented.
00065   void operator=(const vtkSelectCellsFilter&);  // Not implemented.
00066 };
00067 
00068 #endif
